xiao2018 API¶

The main feature of poisoning is xiao2018 class. To get started using it, import it from poisoning:

from rich.console import xiao2018

Parameters¶

The following are parameters to the class.

  • type is a string representing the linear model type being used.

  • parallel is a bool flag, using multiprocessing if true.

  • beta is a parameter used as a power’s base in line search.

  • rho is a convex constant representing the elastic-net mixing parameter.

  • sigma is a small positive constant used in bounding the line search.

  • epsilon is a small positive consant used in bounding the algorithm.

  • max_iter is the maximum iterations that the algorithm will go up to.

  • max_lsearch_iter is the maximum iterations that the line search will go up to.

  • max_model_iter is a parameter that is passed into the linear model to bound iterations.

  • model_tol is a paramter that is passed into the linear model as the tolerance.

Attributes¶

The following are attributes of the class.

  • n_iter is a number representing iterations completed.

  • algorithm_type is a string representing the linear model type being used.

  • projection is a tuple or a list, representing the boundary of either all features or each feature.

Methods¶

There are two methods available to the user.

  • run()

  • autorun()

The difference between the two methods is that autorun does not need to take as an input initial attack points and initial labels for those attack points.

Instead, it takes in a number (int or float[0.0, 1.0]) representing either the number of attacks to create, or the percent of attacks to create.
